languages.text: "Истинная плоть позволяет мне эффективно функционировать даже в условиях экстенсивной кровопотери. Вот что должно заботить тех, кто рискнул встать против слуги Омниссии в бою".
"My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."
languages.original_text: "Истинная плоть позволяет мне эффективно функционировать даже в условиях экстенсивной кровопотери. Вот что должно заботить тех, кто рискнул встать против слуги Омниссии в бою".

traits.locale_text: "The True Flesh allows me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The True Flesh allows me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The True Flesh allows me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: "The True Flesh allows me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “即使血流不止，我的植入物也会让我在战场上勇猛如故。那些敢于在战场上与欧姆尼塞亚的仆人兵戎相见的家伙，应对此闻风丧胆。”
languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: “即使血流不止，我的实肉也会让我在战场上勇猛如故。那些敢于在战场上与欧姆尼塞亚的仆人兵戎相见的家伙，应对此闻风丧胆。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mes augmentations me permettent de continuer à fonctionner même en cas d'hémorragie excessive. Voilà ce qui attend ceux qui osent se dresser contre un serviteur de l'Omnimessie sur le champ de bataille. »
languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: « La chair véritable me permet de continuer à fonctionner même en cas d'hémorragie excessive. Voilà ce qui attend ceux qui osent se dresser contre un serviteur de l'Omnimessie sur le champ de bataille. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Dank meiner Augmentationen kann ich auch dann noch effektiv funktionieren, wenn ich sehr viel Blut verloren habe. Das sollte all jene beunruhigen, die es wagen, sich im Kampf gegen einen Diener des Omnissiah zu stellen."
languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: "Dank des Wahren Fleischs kann ich auch dann noch effektiv funktionieren, wenn ich sehr viel Blut verloren habe. Das sollte all jene beunruhigen, die es wagen, sich im Kampf gegen einen Diener des Omnissiah zu stellen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「インプラントのおかげで、大量の出血があっても効果的に機能することができる。これこそ、戦いにおいて万機神のしもべに立ち会う勇気を持つ者たちが懸念すべきことである」
languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: 「真の肉のおかげで、大量の出血があっても効果的に機能することができる。これこそ、戦いにおいて万機神のしもべに立ち会う勇気を持つ者たちが懸念すべきことである」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mis aumentos me permiten funcionar con eficacia incluso tras sufrir pérdidas cuantiosas de sangre. Los enemigos de un sirviente del Omnissiah deberían preocuparse por ese factor».
languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: «La verdadera carne me permite funcionar con eficacia incluso tras sufrir pérdidas cuantiosas de sangre. Los enemigos de un sirviente del Omnissiah deberían preocuparse por ese factor».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

languages.text: "Ogmentlerim, aşırı kan kaybı durumunda bile etkin şekilde işlememi sağlar. Bunu asıl, savaşta karşısına Hermesih'in bu naçiz hizmetkârını alan dert etsin."
languages.original_text: "My augmentations allow me to function effectively even in the event of extensive blood loss. This is what should concern those who dare to stand against a servant of the Omnissiah in battle."

traits.locale_text: "Ogmentlerim, aşırı kan kaybı durumunda bile etkin şekilde işlememi sağlar. Bunu asıl, savaşta karşısına Hermesih'in bu naçiz hizmetkârını alan dert etsin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
